entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Bonaventure

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
